subject: Tennis
organizations: United States Mens Clay Court Championship
lead_paragraph: Marcel Granollers-Pujol upset top-seeded James Blake, 6-4, 1-6, 7-5, at the United States Men’s Clay Court Championship in Houston for his first ATP Tour title. The seventh-seeded Granollers-Pujol, a Spaniard ranked No. 84, came back from a 3-0 deficit in the third set.
